TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi StatusBar extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件在应用程序窗口的水平栏中显示项和信息。

span.span: Represents a control that displays items and information in a horizontal bar in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着它可以包含的任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. A是通常会显示水平行的映像和状态信息的条。A is a bar that typically displays a horizontal row of images and status information. 你可以将中的项划分到包含相关的项，通过使用组控件。You can divide the items in a into groups that contain related items, by using controls. 中的项可以显示文本、 图形或其他复杂的内容。The items in a can display text, graphics, or other complex content. 中的项定义为对象。Items in a are defined as objects. 在中定义的事件用户单击中的项时，会引发。Events that are defined on a are raised when the user clicks the item in the . 不接收键盘焦点。The does not receive keyboard focus. 下图显示的示例。The following illustration shows an example of a . **状态栏****Status Bar** ![状态栏](~/add/media/ss-ctl-statusbar.GIF "状态栏")![Status bar](~/add/media/ss-ctl-statusbar.GIF "Status bar") ## 自定义状态栏控件Customizing the StatusBar Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[StatusBar 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/statusbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [StatusBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/statusbar-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在按钮控件的默认模板中，通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建。The following example creates a . summary.span: 获取或设置用于选择用来显示每个项的模板的自定义逻辑。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom logic for choosing a template used to display each item.

value.span: 一个自定义对象，它提供逻辑并返回一个项容器。

span.span: A custom object that provides logic and returns an item container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用选择不同的项容器，如果你的集合中的项具有相同的类型，并且你需要提供自定义逻辑，以选择项容器。Use an to choose different item containers if the items in your collection are the same type and you need to provide custom logic to choose the item container. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置指示菜单是根据基础集合中项的类型还是一些其他的启发方法来选择不同的项容器的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.

value.span: 下拉菜单中选择不同的项容器，为；否则为 。

span.span: the menu selects different item containers; otherwise, .
The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是很有用，如果你想要创建菜单通过绑定到集合。This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection. 项容器是显示集合中的对象的用户界面元素。The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection. 如果你想要绑定到集合以创建包含菜单对象和对象，设置属性为 true，创建为每个类型的集合中的对象。If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains objects and objects, set the property to true and create an for each type of object in your collection. 每个必须包含或。Each must contain either a or a . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
